meanings.definition: A divine rule or law, especially one given by God.
meanings.sent1: The commandments in the Bible teach us how to live a good life.
meanings.sent2: The Ten Commandments are a set of rules that many people follow.
meanings.sent3: When the puppy chewed up my shoes, I jokingly told him he had broken one of the commandments.
meanings.sent4: The commandments of nature dictate that every action has a consequence.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the commandments is important for those who seek guidance in their lives.

meanings.sent1: The teacher's commandments were clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The military commander issued strict commandments to the troops.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to have its own set of commandments for how the house should be run.
meanings.sent4: The commandments from the boss left no room for interpretation.
meanings.sent5: Following the safety commandments is crucial in preventing accidents.
